item.title: Game Programming Patterns
item.description: What is Software Architecture? It’s less about writing code than it is about organizing it. Good architecture makes a huge difference in productivity. But, like all things in life, it doesn’t come free. Good architecture takes real effort and discipline. Every time you make a change or implement a feature, you have to work hard to integrate it gracefully into the rest of the program. You have to think about which parts of the program should be decoupled and introduce abstractions at those points.
